column1: o'neil barnett| a graveside service for oneil barnett
column3: of hanceville will be held on saturday
column5: 2015 at 11 a. m. at mountain grove congregational christian church cemetery; bro. wayne wisener officiating. the family will receive friends on friday from 5:30 p. m. to 9 p. m. at the funeral home. hanceville funeral home is in charge of arrangements. mrs. barnett passed away on wednesday
column7: 2015 at hanceville nursing & rehab. she was born on september 28
column8: 1918 in cullman county to walter & eula mae carver thompson and is preceded in death by her parents; her husband
column9: william arthur barnett; and a son
column10: donald barnett. she is survived by a daughter
column11: rebecca (mark) hounschell; three sons: wesley (ann) barnett
column12: howard (becky) barnett and ralph barnett; a daughter-in-law
column14: great grandchildren and great great grandchildren.
